page.title: 15LEISURE-CHILDREN
page.content: {Bikes}are the most popular outdoor activity.This is due to the fact that {stunt bikes}have become very popular. This cheap form of transport allows children to visit friends and local facilities.In this way children are independent of their parents.However many children are restricted to a limited area. {Marbles}is the most popular game to play inside at home.They are round glass objects.Two people play,one person throws his marble and the other person tries to hit it.If he or she hits it they keep the other persons marble and their own,but if they miss the other person has a go.It keeps on going on like this until someone wins.
